Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

English Suite no. 2 in A minor, BWV 807

c. 1720

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 21'

  • 1. Prélude
  • 2. Allemande
  • 3. Courante
  • 4a. Sarabande
  • 4b. Les agréments de la même Sarabande
  • 5. Bourrée I – Bourrée II – Bourrée I
  • 6. Gigue

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 7 · BA 5052-01 · Die sechs Englischen Suiten · ed. Alfred Dürr
  • Associated Board · English Suites Nos. 1–3 · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5165 · Die sechs Englischen Suiten · ed. Alfred Dürr
  • Henle · HN 595 · Englische Suiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including further version of mov. 4b]
  • Henle · HN 596 · Englische Suiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including further version of mov. 4b]
  • Henle · HN 1595 · Englische Suiten · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including further version of mov. 4b]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50060 · Englische Suiten · ed. Walter Dehnhard

1. Prélude

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Allemande

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Courante

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

4a. Sarabande

Bach gives two versions of the sarabande: one straightforward and one with more elaborate ornamentation. One of the two versions can be chosen in whole, or the two can be combined with the more richly ornamented version played for the repetitions.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

4b. Les agréments de la même Sarabande

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

5. Bourrée I – Bourrée II – Bourrée I

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2

6. Gigue

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5
